resources.string: ❖ Hozon is application based Food waste management system can assist in collecting the Leftover food from hotel & Restaurants or any other function distribute among tose in need .
❖ By using this app benefits will be both the restaurant and the needy.
❖ User can play role in saving food waste and help the needy.
2. You can login by your registered mail ID and password.
3. Then first read the Terms and Condition then click the check box for accepting terms and conditions.
4. After click the check box just fill the reponse form and wait for 10 minutes to our team contact you.
❖ Make sure the food in good condition before we come and collect.
❖ Save the food in safe place also in proper way.
❖ Make sure your food was cooked before 5 to 7 hours you send the form
❖ If you accept tease terms and condition the check the box and fill response form.
I agree the terms and conditions
